instructions.1: mix 600G of lean beef with 1TBSP garlic, 1TBSP paprika, 1TBSP black pepper, 30ML soy sauce, 1TBSP sesame oil and mix it up.

instructions.2: cook in high heat for 10 minutes and set it aside

instructions.3: in a frying pan, add light 20g of butter, 1tbsp of garlic, 60,l bbq or teriyaki sauce, 50ml of soy sauce, honey and let it cook in medium heat
